title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: On linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000). When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, so does the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X). If it starts moving around, I think users will get confused.
OB: The close button moves down when the view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127. This behavior does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000.
EB: The close button should not move down when the view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127. It should remain in its original position.
SR: Ensure that the close button stays in its original position when the view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127.
